item.description:
This is the weekly Tuesday mid-day meetup for the Longwood Medical Area.

Meetup at the front entrance to the Boston Latin School at 12:15pm. Address is 78 Avenue Louis Pasteur.

This walk will last for just about 1/2 hour, ending back at the school.

Anything short of umbrella-restrained-rain, and we'll go.

Look for Tuesday and Thursday walks each week: Tues is 12:15pm and Thursday is 12:45pm. Feedback on the schedule is welcome and we'll adjust as demand grows.
item.name: Longwood Medical Area Fens Mid-Day Walk
